Contradict fact: The claim falsely attributes the viral Facebook post to Dave Ramsey when it was actually written by "Bruce Hendry" and published on a right-wing website.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the involvement of Dave Ramsey in writing the viral Facebook post.
Falters at times: The claim fails to accurately attribute the authorship of the viral Facebook post and misrepresents the role of Dave Ramsey.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that Dave Ramsey wrote the viral Facebook post.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Dave Ramsey is the author of the viral Facebook post without proper verification.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider the alternative explanation that the viral Facebook post was written by someone else and falsely attributed to Dave Ramsey.
